trans-unit.source: Identifies the types of connection points that a transformer supports.
trans-unit.target: 識別連接點轉換程式支援的型別。

trans-unit.source: Transformers are used to translate data between two Web Parts controls with incompatible connection points.
trans-unit.target: 轉換程式用來轉譯具有不相容的連接點的兩個 Web 組件控制項之間的資料。

trans-unit.source: Connection points are incompatible when they provide or consume data through different interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 在提供或取用資料，透過不同的介面時，連接點不相容。

trans-unit.source: For example, a provider implementing a provider connection point of type <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow> could not directly connect to a consumer expecting a provider connection point of type <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartTable>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，實作提供者連接點的類型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow>可能不是直接連接到接收類型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartTable>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartTable>的提供者連接點的取用者</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow>的提供者

trans-unit.source: Instead, a transformer must be used to connect the two connection points.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，必須使用轉換程式連接的兩個連接點。

trans-unit.source: A customized transformer can be created by deriving a class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> class.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立自訂的轉換程式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>衍生類別

trans-unit.source: The WebPartTransformerAttribute attribute is applied to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> class.
trans-unit.target: WebPartTransformerAttribute 屬性會套用至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>

trans-unit.source: It defines the type of provider connection point and the type of consumer connection point that a transformer supports.
trans-unit.target: 它會定義提供者連接點的類型和轉換程式支援的消費者連接點的類型。

trans-unit.source: The type of consumer and provider connection points supported by the transformer must match the connection points of the consumer and provider Web Parts controls for a connection to be made between the controls.
trans-unit.target: 消費者和提供者連接點支援的轉換程式型別必須符合建立控制項之間的連接消費者和提供者 Web 組件控制項的連接點。

trans-unit.source: At run time, the type of connection points that a particular transformer supports can be retrieved through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerAttribute.GetConsumerType%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerAttribute.GetProviderType%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 在執行階段，支援特定的轉換程式的連接點的類型可以透過擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerAttribute.GetConsumerType%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerAttribute.GetProviderType%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerAttribute.GetProviderType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerAttribute.GetConsumerType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerAttribute"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The WebPartTransformerAttribute constructor sets the consumer connection point type and the provider connection point type for the transformer.
trans-unit.target: WebPartTransformerAttribute 建構函式會設定消費者連接點類型和提供者連接點類型轉換。

trans-unit.source: These values can be retrieved through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerAttribute.ConsumerType%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerAttribute.ProviderType%2A> property, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 這些值可以透過擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerAttribute.ConsumerType%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerAttribute.ProviderType%2A>屬性，分別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerAttribute.ProviderType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerAttribute.ConsumerType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the interface supported by the consumer connection point.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>的消費者連接點所支援的介面。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the interface supported by the provider connection point.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>的提供者連接點所支援的介面。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: consumerType or providerType is not specified.
trans-unit.target: consumerType或providerType未指定。

trans-unit.source: consumerType equals providerType.
trans-unit.target: consumerType等於providerType。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Type> of the interface supported by the consumer connection point.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Type>的消費者連接點所支援的介面。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The ConsumerType property is set through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: ConsumerType 屬性透過設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerAttribute.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerAttribute.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the interface supported by the consumer connection point.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>的消費者連接點所支援的介面。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Returns the consumer type a transformer can accept on a connection point.
trans-unit.target: 傳回取用者類型轉換器可以接受的連接點上。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> object and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object use the GetConsumerType method to determine whether the consumer type of the transformer matches the consumer connection point of the Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>物件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>物件使用 GetConsumerType 方法來判斷轉換程式的取用者型別是否符合 Web 組件控制項的消費者連接點。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The type of transformer.
trans-unit.target: 轉換程式型別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the consumer connection point.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>的消費者連接點。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: transformerType is not specified.
trans-unit.target: transformerType未指定。

trans-unit.source: transformerType is not an object derived from the class.
trans-unit.target: transformerType不是物件衍生自類別。

trans-unit.source: Returns the provider type a transformer can accept on a connection point.
trans-unit.target: 傳回提供者類型轉換器可以接受的連接點上。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> object and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object use the GetProviderType method to determine whether the provider type of the transformer matches the provider connection point of the Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>物件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>物件使用 GetProviderType 方法來判斷提供者類型的轉換程式是否符合 Web 組件控制項的提供者連接點。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The type of transformer.
trans-unit.target: 轉換程式型別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the provider connection point.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>的提供者連接點。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: transformerType is not specified.
trans-unit.target: transformerType未指定。

trans-unit.source: transformerType is not an object derived from the class.
trans-unit.target: transformerType不是物件衍生自類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Type> of the interface supported by the provider connection point.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Type>的提供者連接點所支援的介面。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The ProviderType property is set through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 透過設定提供者類型屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerAttribute.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerAttribute.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the interface supported by the provider connection point.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>的提供者連接點所支援的介面。</xref:System.Type>
